content: Act as a helpful AI assistant
Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

with `wrap_string(text, 50)`.
# 3. Write a function that replaces all digits from the given string with "X" except for the last digit. Provide an example using your function on the following string: `text = "We will replace all digits from this text except the last one."`.
